rows.label: qev087103_MSG0001
rows.name:
That's right. We've located a Wrothian Skell.
It seems mostly undamaged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0002
rows.name:
No, no pilot in sightâ€”
it's unclear if they abandoned the Skell or were killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0003
rows.name: What about the data unit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0004
rows.name: Intact, as far as I can see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0005
rows.name: Excellent. Please bring it back with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0006
rows.name:
Also a sample of the plating,
and any weaponry you can manage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0007
rows.name: We'll do what we can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0008
rows.name: Ready for a little manual labor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0009
rows.name: Are you kidding?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0009_2
rows.name: I can't wait to get this stuff home to analyze it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_JNK0010
rows.name: Caution

rows.label: qev087103_SEL0011
rows.name: Warn that Chausson might have his own motives.

rows.label: qev087103_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev087103_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Elma if she knows more than she's saying.

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0010
rows.name: Huh? What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0011
rows.name: Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0012
rows.name: What do you mean?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0013
rows.name: I suppose an explanation's in order.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0014
rows.name: Huh? About what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0015
rows.name: About this mission. Or about his intentions, at least.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0016
rows.name: You mean the director general?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0017
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0018
rows.name: Uh-oh. Is he up to something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0019
rows.name: Well, no point in hiding it, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0020
rows.name: I can't be certain, but if I had to venture a guess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'd assume this is all just insurance
in case an alliance falls through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0022
rows.name:
You mean, we're gathering this data
to make fighting the Wrothians easier?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0023
rows.name: Oh, I'm sure that diplomatic talks will come first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0024
rows.name:
And even if we can't secure a friendship,
that doesn't mean we have to fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0025
rows.name:
But it's always good to prepare for
the worst possible scenario.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0026
rows.name:
Especially if you're the man responsible
for the safety of all of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0027
rows.name: Well, I hope the alliance can work out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087103_MSG0028
rows.name: As do I, Lin. For now, let's get back to work.
